description: ff. 272. 305 x 205; 202 x 120 mm. 31 lin. Ramaḍān 1067. Anon. supergloss on al-Taftāzānīʼs gloss. Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى هدانا بالهداىة الذانىة الاصلىة
title: Jawāhir al-taḥqīq.
subject: Taftāzānī, Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar, 1322-1389?—ḥāshiyah ʻalá sharḥ al-Ījī.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
